mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_QUERY ( F_QUERY_ID, F_OWNER_CLASS_ID, F_QUERY_NAME, F_FILTER, F_ORDER, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{ queryId }, #{ ownerClassId }, #{ queryName }, #{ filter }, #{ order }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note } )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_QUERY SET F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = #{ ownerClassId }, F_QUERY_NAME = #{ queryName }, F_FILTER = #{ filter }, F_ORDER = #{ order }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note } WHERE F_QUERY_ID = #{ queryId }
mapper.select: SELECT F_QUERY_ID AS "queryId", F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", F_QUERY_NAME AS "queryName", F_FILTER AS "filter", F_ORDER AS "order", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_QUERY WHERE F_QUERY_ID = #{ queryId }
